REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f1249 reute r f BC-DU-PONT-<DD>-UNIT-TO 04-13 0053

TEXT.TITLE: DU PONT <DD> UNIT TO REDEEM NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Du Pont Overseas Capital N.V., a unit of Du Pont Co, said it will redeem on May 15 all 189 mln dlrs of its outstanding 13-3/4 pct guaranteed retractable notes due 1997. It will buy back the notes at par value plus accrued interest, Du Pont Overseas said. Reuter
